mapper.select: SELECT a.*, u.u_name FROM article a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.a_writer = u.u_id WHERE ( (#{srchType} = 0) OR (#{srchType} = 1 AND (INSTR(a.a_title, #{srchText}) > 0 OR INSTR(a.a_content, #{srchText}) > 0)) OR (#{srchType} = 2 AND INSTR(u.u_name, #{srchText}) = 1) ) AND a.b_id = #{boardId} group by a.a_id order by a.a_id desc limit #{start}, #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.a_writer = u.u_id WHERE ( (#{srchType} = 0) OR (#{srchType} = 1 AND (INSTR(a.a_title, #{srchText}) > 0 OR INSTR(a.a_content, #{srchText}) > 0)) OR (#{srchType} = 2 AND INSTR(u.u_name, #{srchText}) = 1) ) AND a.b_id = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT article (a_title, a_writer, a_content, b_id) VALUES (#{a_title}, #{a_writer}, #{a_content}, #{b_id})
